You know what a game full of toxic tryhards and wildly-swinging imbalances needs? An MMR system that's completely unrelated to the ranking system, removing all sense of knowing how you're doing compared to others and whether your progress is based on luck or skill. And for extra giggles, it makes the side content impossible to complete by expecting you to complete side content tasks in an environment where your fellow players are severely underranked due to MMR. 

BHVR is one of the most incompetent companies around. Every patch breaks the game in basic ways REPEATEDLY -- the same sound bugs have occurred over 5 times in the past 2 years at this point. They make blatant cash grabs, which at this point makes the sheer amount of DLC more of a grind with a high price tag attached. 

They have no clue what they're doing. They manage to stay just inside the line of keeping this game playable to keep hope alive in its playerbase. Don't fall for it. They haven't been competent since Day 1, and their occasional progress doesn't offset the fact that they'll never be a company worth giving money to.

This game has alot of potential. It is honestly a fun game, even if it could be so much more. But as others have said, I was a rank 1 getting matched with high ranks. It really is very unfair and frustrating. I felt severely handicapped. Also the load times are insane. Sometimes after waiting for 5 minutes or 10 minutes, I realized the loading is going nowhere and the only way to exit out of the loading screen is to ctrl atl delete. I feel like i can't even get into a game. And this is after "match has started". It's too much of a hassle to even get into a game, despite the game being decently fun. I'm done with the literally endless load screens. A waste of money.

It's so broken in its current state. Sure there are 4 survivors, but the chance of you actually winning is about 20% I'd give it. The killers are so over powered, well the newer ones anyway. The latest one has 8 traps she can lay down and there are only 5 generators so she just needs to plant 5 of those traps down. You trigger it she warps to it and bam, instant kill. She hooks you and places another trap. You're buddies can't get to you. Then there's the mike myers one. He can Insta-kill you. Levelling up doesn't do crap because you can't keep any of it. Developers, buff the survivors because this game is currently unplayable. It's really fun when you play with the older killers because it was more even than before. But again there is no point to leveling up as far as I can tell because everything is a chance of working. For example, you have a 25% chance of being on this map, or 15% of this thing appearing and so on. Also any perk, item, and ability you bring into game will go away if you die. So why did I spend all that time leveling if it's just not going to matter? I wish this game wasn't so damn broken.

This game is a blast. I've been playing since the beginning and I have to say, this game has come quite a long way. First of all, the diversity of the game play is incredible, and because of that, the replayability of this game is high. You can choose to gain expertise as a survivor role or a killing role as a myriad of survivors and killers all with their own unique, detailed backstories. 

They are constantly adding update DLC's to the game and have incorporated killers from popular horror franchises, as well as some original ones.

Downsides are that competitive ranking does not result in any rewards and that servers are not dedicated, so that killer hosts the server every time.

Community can be toxic, but that's holds true with any large, growing game. I have met many people who were respectful in playing this game.

Buy it.

8.5/10

03/08/2017 update:

Major bugs fixed. Still far from perfect, but well worth your money. 

01/03/2017 update:

Saving bug fixed. 2 nasty bugs that are known for over a month still going. Devs are on vacation and not giving a flying fuck. All we have are mods in the forums saying "they will be fixed asap". 

- One is the infinite screen loading bug. If you play survivor, there's a very high chance you get stuck in the loading screen when joining a lobby. The latest patch fixed it for killers, but it only made it worst for survivors.

- The other is an exploit that allows killers to have survivors perks, survivors having more of the same perk, among some other stuff.  The perk bug pretty much allows players from both sides to hack the game with wall and speed hacks. 

When not on vacation, devs seem more focused on paid DLC and make custom stuff for streamers than addresing game breaking bugs. Please, do not give your money to them. At least not until they start to listen to their costumers. Wait for a free weekend.  

Original review:

The game is good, really good. But the way devs deal with game braking bugs and community feedback is one of the worst I've ever seen. 

There's a bug going on, where people are losing all their progress in the game. If you contact devs, all you'll get is a bot reply: "Nothing we can do, sorry". Awesome customer service.

It didn't happen to me, but I read a lot about it in forums.

Devs neglected this bug for a while, and after a lot of complains they made a sticky in forums asking players to back up their saves.

Problem is, not everybody goes to forums. There should be an ingame message warning about this major bug, telling people what to do.

Don't buy it until they fix it.

this game is a great game. really addicting annd really fun. that is when it finally loads. this is the first review i ever write about ANY game, because usually I just dont care. I do my reserch before i get any game and if its bad, I kind of already expected it so i dont get too mad, it was a risk i took. But this game sounded so good and exicting, I had to give it a try even with all the reports about being a buggy game. Sure it couldnt be that bad, right? Well... it was. of the 12hrs i have on this game i must had spent playing it about 6hr. 6 great and fun hour true, but i just didnt had it in me to batlle the loading screen anymore. everytime you go to a macth making its a drawn. it could go well, or you could be facing a loading screnn that if you let it, will go on for hours (literelly, I've tried), and every time that happens the only way to get past it, is either wait it out (sometimes takes ONLY 10 - 15min) or force quit and restart the game completly (wich takes less than 10 min but its a hasle)
I ended up requesting a refund. dont buy this game if you dont have 1hr to waste for a 10 min gameplay.

It was still all good until they came out with the hag. The hag is a killer that inspires and benefits from camping, thus inticing killers to camp even more. When the killer camps, it ruins the game. The game revolves around team work and helping your survivor allies out when they get hooked. GG for ruining the game even further with the introduction of the hag. Instead of continueing to introduce game breaking mechanics, stop, go back, and fix what is already broken. Game is being uninstalled as of today.

The devs need to stop dissing the playerbase and blaming them being "bad" because they won't fix basic gameplay issues (lobby balance, hook camping, hook trapping, facecamping, infinite loops, sabo rushes, and more). Really sad because this game could be effing FANTASTIC if they actually fixced the issues and didn't just nerf every perk in the game trying to "balance" it. A year in, and they STILL haven't fixed glitches that have been in the game since day one.

Instead, they keep adding paid DLC killers.

It could be amazing, I like it decently enough, but it's frustrating to see the dev team make random dev decisions instead of planning well and implementing actual solutions. Don't bother unless it is on a massive sale.

Dead by Daylight ist für mich immer noch eins der Spiele die ich wirklich gern mag da es Spannung und Spaß aufbringt. Leider finde ich persönlich das die Ladezeiten der lobby irgendwie wieder langsam weren. *Habe das letzte mal irgendwie 30 minuten gewartet *
Auch würde ich gern einige DLC's kaufen, doch um ehrlich zu sein ist mir 6  oder 7€ für dbd zu teuer, Dead by Daylight macht spaß das ist gut und schön jedoch ist es meiner Meinung nach einfach zu 'teuer' denn wie gesagt es ist ein Spiel. Für andere Spiele bezahle ich sowas gern da in solchen DLC's eben DInge vorhanden sind wie: Neue STory, Outfit, was weiß ich alles und in dbd ist das halt für den selben Preis einfach ein Killer und eine Überlebende. Natürlich weiß ich das ihr euer Geld damit verdient aber ihr könntet das auch einfach mal so machen wie bei der Nurse. Herunterladbar wenn man mag, wenn nicht dann nicht. Außerdem wenn man mit nem neuen Killer nich klarkommt? Dann hat man das halt 'umsonst' ausgegeben ._.   .
Wie gesagt ich mag dbd aber manchmal regt mich sowas einfach irgendwie auf. 

Achso und an Spieler die meinen müssen als Killer zu campen: ich hasse euch und ihr verderbt mir den Spielspaß.

Danke für's lesen!

Best game ever !!!!!!!!!But 10000000000 Bugs....D:

Edit: This game added a ping indicator as a survivor before entering a game. That's all that we ever needed. This is a great game, that was plagued by a faulty infrastructure. We've gotten some updates and fixes, as well as some additions to help cope with it. It's playable now.

This is a really fun game. Great concept, great replayability. I can't in good conscience recommend it to people in general though. The peer to peer hosting is just atrocious. Game constantly hangs at loading screens requiring a force end task, people disconnect from 45% of your games, game immediately kicks you to the survivor menu as soon as you enter a lobby, or you rubber band everywhere if you even manage to get into a game. They want to make this game competitive, they need to front the money for some good dedicated servers for match hosting. One quick solution to avoid these issues is to just play as a killer. I get wonderful games when I do, nobody dcs everyone is having a good old time. Unfortunately, the sole determination as to who you are matched against is rank - not your character's level. So once you start winning some games as a killer, it will begin to match you with people with maxed out survivor levels making it nigh impossible to ever catch and find them. I'm not sure why this game needs a ranked matchmaking system, it is certainly not a very competitive game insofar as being considered an esport. So many lame mechanics that people can abuse. Just another way esport/twitch are fundamentally ruining potentially wonderful games by making developers feel like they need to make their games "esport MLG competitive."

Fix the hosting problems, and this game is great regardless of the matchmaking issues.

Je joue à ce jeu depuis la bêta.

J'ai craqué pour son ambiance et son univers unique, le jeu était une petite perle dans son genre mais avec l'arrivée du "survive with friends" le jeu a beaucoup changé.
Pour y avoir joué presque 300heures en jouant aussi bien tueur que survivant, rank1 à chaque saison aisément.
Je ne peux que m'attrister devant l'état actuel du jeu... En effet les survivants avaient jusque là un net avantage. Certains perks de tueurs tel que insidieux perdaient tout leur intérêt face un groupe de premade, les infinite loop encore présente même si bon nombre d'entre elles ont été supprimées nuise également à la qualité du jeu. Je ne parle pas des glitchs..

Cependant toutes les précédentes mises à jour n'ont fait que renforcer et rendre plus fort les tueurs, ce qui en soit est une bonne chose pour tenir tête à un très bon groupe de premade. Mais parlons des campeurs ?
Je ne parle pas de ces tueurs qui font des rondes autour de vous mais bel et bien de ceux qui vous regardent vous vider de votre sang en vous fixant dans le blanc des yeux.

Alors que nous attendions tous la "maj promise" qui allait mettre fin à cette slug/camp meta. Vous nous sortez un dlc payant avec un tueur qui ne peut que "camper" pour espérer gagner.
Honnêtement, la map du marais est géniale, le modèle du tueur et du survivant le sont aussi, j'ai recommandé le jeu à bon nombre d'amis qui m'ont rejoint, mais qu'est-ce qui vous a pris de créer un tueur axé sur le camp tant toxique pour la communauté ?

J'adore jouer contre des bons tueurs, frissoner et faire de longues parties contre eux quitte à finir par mourir et m'incliner devant le génie de ces tueurs, mais là dire "gg" à un mec qui vous a juste harcamp ? Sans moi.


C'est ce pourquoi après 300h de jeu j'en viens à ce triste constat. Arrêtez un peu avec les dlc payant et prenez soin de votre jeu mais surtout de votre communauté.


Cordialement, un fan écoeuré...

Dead by Daylight ist mehr als empfehlenswert und ein Spiel mit Suchtpotenzial. Alle Spieler, die auf Survival-Multiplayer mit Horror- und Adrenalinschüben stehen, kommen um dieses Spiel nicht drumherum. Seit der ersten Stunde bemühen sich die Entwickler um Bugfixes und neuen interessanten Content. Es kommen immer wieder neue Survivor, Killer, Maps und Fähigkeiten.
Das Ziel des Spiels ist simpel. Als Survivor: Repariere alle Generatoren, um die Ausgangstore öffnen zu können und zu entkommen. Als Killer: Versuche, alle zu töten, bevor sie die Möglichkeit haben, zu fliehen. Nebenbei muss man aber aufpassen, nicht vom Killer erwischt zu werden. Sobald man am Haken hängt, ist man auf die Hilfe der Mitspieler angewiesen.
Man erhält diverse nützliche Items sowohl beim Leveln im Blutnetz, als auch auf der Map in Kisten, die man durchsucht. Diese unterstützen euch alle auf ihre eigene Art und Weise. Ihre Fähigkeiten können mit sogenannten Add-Ons erweitert oder verstärkt werden.
Opfergaben erhält man ebenfalls im Blutnetz. Diese werden beim Spielstart verbrannt und gewähren euch verschiedene Boni.
Perks sind die eigentlichen Fähigkeiten eures Charakters. Diese können im Laufe des Spiels in ihrer Auswirkung erhöht werden, je höher euer Level ist. Jeder Charakter (auch die Killer) haben ihre ganz eigenen Perks. Das heißt, ihr solltet am Anfang weise wählen, wie ihr das Spiel bestreiten wollt, um den passenden Charakter mit den wichtigen Fähigkeiten auszuwählen. Seid ihr ein Teamplayer? Oder doch eher ein Einzelgänger? Allerdings könnt ihr nach jedem Match auch wieder auf einen anderen Charakter wechseln.
Insgesamt war ich schon lange nicht mehr so begeistert von einem Spiel und kann es einfach nur weiterempfehlen.

Dead by Daylight hat im Grunde genommen einen sehr interessanten Spielansatz.
Ob mit Freunden oder alleine. Spaß macht es und zeigt auf, wie wichtig Teamplay ist.
Eigentlich.
Leider gibt es viel zu viele Camper bei den Killern, genauso wie Leute mit unkameradschaftlicher Spielweise was die Überlebenden betrifft. 
Die Entwickler sind an diesem Verhalten natürlich nicht Schuld, aber auch von seiten dessen gibt es viele Probleme. Das Spielen auf deutschen Servern ist unmöglich. Ich spawne nicht einmal in die Lobby. Jetzt schon England, USA, Kanada, Australien, Österreich und Russland ausprobiert. Auch da gibt es immer wieder Probleme. Man kommt in keine Lobby, es hängt sich sofort auf und wenn man es doch einmal auf die Map schafft, laggt es teilweise extrem. Steine spawnen 20 cm vor dir, der Spieler wird häufig zur Seite gebuggt oder man kann sich gar nicht mehr bewegen und hängt fest. Es wäre schön, wenn DARAN gearbeitet und damit aufgehört wird, dauernd DLCs für recht teure Preise rauszuhauen. Wenn das Gameplay stimmt und ich ohne mich aufzuregen laggfrei spielen kann.. - Dann unterstütze ich auch wieder die Entwickler.

No new content unless you want to spend extra money on DLCs to play a character.
Survivors are not afraid of the killer anymore. why should they? they have the tools to just run around the killer the whole game.
Devs make changes considering only the low tier players complaining about things, and not trying to balance the game for high(good) ranked players.


So like I said, this game was a horror survival game: As a killer you focused on killing people. As a survivor you focused on running away from the killer and survive, which should be the point of this game. Now the game is all about farming points. Killers have to let survivors go to get more points (let them get unhooked or leave them when they use infinites). And if you are a survivor, you can just run around collecting points for free. Killers can't camp, because they wont get points -> free 1500 points. We have totems -> free 400 points. Destroy hooks -> free 500 points. use infintes -> free 8000 boldness points.

So many changes has been done to the game, you cant even play your own style anymore.
For example:
At the beginning, you wanna save ppl, you are rewarded with points. you wanna be selfish, you can do gens get out, rewareded with points. Now you have to save ppl, escpecially if they get hooked within the 1st minute of the game, or you wont be able to get out.

As a killer main, I havent played this game for a very long time, and I dont feel like playing it any time soon either.

From the killer's perspective (rank 1-5 killer):

Survivors got buffed like no tomorrow. As a survivor if you get on the killers shoulder you deserve to get hooked, because you messed up. But no, first killers got nerfed, then add survive with friends, then gave survivors Decisive Strike. Survivors are not punished for being caught, they get a 2nd or maybe a 3rd chance to waste 2 minutes of your time chasing again.
As a killer if you camp the hook, you wont get points, if you don't and survivors escape, you wont feel very good either, but either way, you are a noob, you will be t-bagged by the survivors, and there is where the community comes in, its as bad as in any other online game.
Infinites are still in the game... Good job devs.
Had to wait till level 60 to get level one Iron Grasp, meanwhile in every game, my hooks are all gone, and you know how frustrating playing that type of games where you have no hooks at all.
Can't play my favourite killer, which is The Wraith, because he was completely useless, cant get points for anything.
Survivors are not afraid of the killer anymore, just get 4 decent ones and the will run around you the whole game, flashlight stuns, etc...

Playing as a survivor:
I was rank 5-7 with survivor, and all I got is ranks 17-20 new to the game teammates against a 1-5 prestiged killers. Not fun, all I hope for is a black pip in that situation and I might not get it.
If the killer against me rage quits, I lose a pip... thats straight up bs
Then they bring in pay to farm points, The Shape, stalk couple of ppl. hook 2 survivors and even if we all get out thats 15k points. I think we can all agree that it was very easy to get points with Michael Myers. He was also strong.

Que deicr... Bueno no llevo ni 15 horas de juego pero tengo que decir que las que llevo son suficientes. En el punto de vista del superviviente es muy divertido y a la vez raro saber que tienes que esconderte de un asesino y rescatar a tus compañeros de ser asesinados. En el punto de vista del asesino... Muchos camperos,pero tambien gente muy legal. Y ahora ya en mi punto de vista, no me parece bien jugar con mis amigos solo de superviviente, tambien me gustaria otro modo de juego con mas supervivientes y dos asesino. Eso seria mejor.
Nota 8/10.

I like this game, alright?
However the more I play and the more I see content coming out the more I want to tell others why not to buy it.

the game isn't bad, there are some bugs here and there sure, and they are working very hard to fix these issues that arise as well as add new features into the game such as maps, costumes, monsters, and people.
BUT what they lost along the way of getting bigger I believe is something very important, they sold out. They keep asking money for all the dlc they come out with, which... isn't too big a deal but for one thing the game isn't even 100% finished, and even if it was it would be one hell of a mistake to purchase it, I caved, bought one of the dlc packs. but I will not be buying another just so I can have an advantage in multiplayer.
очень хорошая игра! Практически без багов! Но огнетушитель советую держать  рядом
Хотелось бы более детальные настройки графики, но в целом игра мне понравилась

Ist ja echt ein hammer Game, aber bitte  macht das man  im Volbildmodus Spielen kann.


Danke<3

un gioco a mio parer divertente,anche se in queste 20 ore di gioco ho riscontrato molti bug che rendono lo stile gioco impossibile per i sopravvisuti,mentre per il killer non posso dire nulla è struttarato molto bene.Spero che questa recensione verrà letta dai creatori per patchare alcuni bug.
